front.title: Guidelines for the Definition of New Top-Level Media Types

abstract.t: The goal of this document is to identify best practices for defining new top-level media types. It updates RFC 6838, when approved. Comments and discussion about this document should be directed to media-types@ietf.org, the mailing list of the Media Type Maintenance (mediaman) WG. Alternatively, issues can be raised on github at https://github.com/ietf-wg-mediaman/toplevel.
